result.title: Consolidated multidimensional list of needs towards market deployment
result.description: Final report about multidimensional needs for the deployment of Swappable Battery System for Light categories of vehicles and the acceleration of innovation to market(s)

result.title: Regulatory and Standardization State of the Art
result.description: Final report about the Regulatory and Standardization State of the Art

result.title: Initial data management plan (DMP)
result.description: A data management plan (DMP) will be developed to handle data to be exploited and (in the case of non- confidential data) disseminated. The DMP will outline the principles and processes for data collection, organization, management, storage, security, analysis and sharing of the project.

result.title: Plan for dissemination and exploitation including communication activities
result.description: The Plan will refine the project’s target audiences, key messages and communication channels and identify the key results to be disseminated as well as a strategy for theexploitation of the project outcomes. A timeline of activities will be included together with key performance indicators and responsibilities of the different partners.

result.title: Project Website
result.description: A project website will be created, with the aim to attract the target audience and to share information and progress of STAN4SWAP, and public reports.

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 1 - STAN4SWAP (A robust standardization roadmap towards boosting innovation to market for swappable Battery Systems for L-cat vehicles deployment as a major contribution to safe, secure, resources and environmental)
result.teaser: One main goal of the 2020 industrial strategy is to support a stronger Single Market for EU’s recovery. This goal will be met enhancing global leadership in technologies and in standard setting towards ensuring interoperability across the EU industrial ecosystems. Standards...

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Technical and Market State of the Art
result.description: Final report about the technical and Market State of the Art

result.title: Project Brochure
result.description: A Project Brochure will be prepared and available by M6 to raise awareness of STAN4SWAP within the target audience identified in the C&D&E Plan.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
